mapper.update: update deliveryorder set d_endCity = #{dEndcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_hasArrived = #{dHasarrived,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_state = #{dState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_riseTime = #{dRisetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, d_remark = #{dRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where d_startingCity = #{dStartingcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select d_startingCity, d_endCity, d_hasArrived, d_state, d_riseTime, d_remark from deliveryorder
